change: Reduce video duration to optimize for high retention pattern
rationale: Top retention video (Doppler Effect: 91.29%) was shortest format. Jet Engine at 69% retention suggests sweet spot at 20-30s where viewers complete full watch
expected_impact: Increase avg retention from 40% to 55-65%, triggering YouTube's algorithm for broader distribution
validation_reason: Change type not in allowed list

change: Reduce media item count to strengthen narrative focus
rationale: High retention videos likely have tighter visual-concept mapping. Fewer transitions at 25s duration (2.5s per clip) creates smoother viewing experience vs current 2.2s pace
expected_impact: Improve viewer comprehension and completion rate, reducing drop-off points during rapid transitions
validation_reason: Change type not in allowed list
